data.title: Nina's Heavenly Delights — Hamilton Public Library
data.meta_description: Nina's Heavenly Delights — A young woman must take over her father's Indian restaurant and compete in The Best of the West Curry Competition. When Nina then falls in love with the beautiful Lisa, she begins to question a world that has been thrown into sudden turmoil. Now she wonders if her feeling will ever be reciprocated and if they are, what will this mean for Nina and her family?
data.text:
